ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Gerald McCann,Chic Stone,Paul Reinman,Gerald McCann,Chic Stone,Paul Reinman
ComicInfo.Title: This Man Is Dangerous!; The Case for E.S.P!; The Ghost of Lefty Shane; Land of Wonder!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Formerly conjoined twins seem to prove the existence of extra-sensory perception.
Alaskan Gil Bryant is saved by men from an underground civilization. Though grateful for their help, Gil plans to return home, but they inform him that 30 years have passed since he left the surface world. When he returns and finds the current surface world inhospitable, he heads north to try to return to the underground world.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Shane O'Shea,Curt Carpenter,Greg Olivetti,Shane O'Shea,Curt Carpenter,Greg Olivetti
